field.output: Step 1: Adding Validations for required fields
field.property: Label;Caption=Step 1: Adding Validations for required fields X=14 Y=20 Height=2 Width=136 ForeColor=0

field.output: To go to Step 1, press OK. On the following screen, mark each required field with an x and press Proceed. The FC Wizard will update Format Control Validations to verify that each marked field is not left blank. The validations will execute on add, update and delete. You will go on to Step 2 upon completion.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=To go to Step 1, press OK. On the following screen, mark each required field with an x and press Proceed. You will go on to Step 2 upon completion. X=20 Y=22 Height=8 Width=120 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=4

field.output: To skip Step 1 and move on to Step 2, press Skip.

field.output: Otherwise, press Cancel to close out of FC Wizard and cancel all Format Control changes.
